explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning, specifically mentioning the Algorithm Selection (AS) paradigm and Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) algorithms.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) algorithms as part of the solution to the Virtual Network Embedding (VNE) problem.
explanations.deep learning: The paper refers to Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL), which is a subset of deep learning, indicating the use of deep neural networks in the proposed solution.
explanations.neural network: Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) involves the use of neural networks, hence the relevance to this keyword.
